description:
Are you brave enough to learn about the hidden side of the magic world?

The magic world is a place of divine light.

The people overwhelmed the monsters, chained them up, sent Sky City high in the blue sky, and created a civilization worthy of praise.

It is believed this place is as orderly, correct, and beautiful as any place can be.

However.

What if something could fundamentally overturn that “polite common understanding”?

Ayato Criminaltrophy.

Job: Sorcery Hacker. His is a Technical Job where he breaks into, hijacks, and steals other people’s magic.

A dragon’s flames attack the city and a seductive demon wields a giant sorcery gun. As Sky City endures this chaos, Ayato uses that opening to pursue the true enemy he should face.

Is he revealing the world’s darkness or its truth?>
